price: Ammas yeroo Gooftaan keessan lallabee: “Yoo na galateeffattan, (ni’imaa kiyya irraa) isiniifin dabala. yoo natti kafartan, dhugumatti adabbiin kiyya akkaan hamaadha” (jedhe yaadadhaa).
arabic: وَإِذۡ تَأَذَّنَ رَبُّكُمۡ لَئِن شَكَرۡتُمۡ لَأَزِيدَنَّكُمۡۖ وَلَئِن كَفَرۡتُمۡ إِنَّ عَذَابِي لَشَدِيدٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.
